candidates.text: Vendor negotiations happen without historical data

selectedCandidate: Vendor negotiations happen without historical data

autopsy.originsConstraints: Emerged from a compliance requirement that has since been updated, but the process wasn't. The retail industry had different pressures then, and the process reflected that reality.
autopsy.assumptionsWorkarounds: People assume the other department needs this format, but nobody has asked them in years. Meanwhile, people have built workarounds: shadow spreadsheets that actually run the process.
autopsy.stakesOutcomes: Multiple teams have optimized around the dysfunction - changing it affects everyone.

workflow.aiDoes: Collects data from multiple sources, runs initial analysis, flags anomalies
workflow.humanDoes: Validates findings, adds context AI can't access, makes final calls
workflow.reasoning: AI excels at this type of work. Judgment calls are frequent.

workflow.aiDoes: Drafts communications, maintains consistency, handles routine updates
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews for tone, handles sensitive messages, manages relationships
workflow.reasoning: Routine enough for AI with this type of work. The volume makes automation essential.

workflow.aiDoes: Runs all standard checks, compares against requirements, documents findings
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews exceptions, makes judgment calls, signs off on final output
workflow.reasoning: Quality requires this type of work. Consistency is the key value-add.

workflow.aiDoes: Manages calendars, resolves conflicts, sends reminders, tracks completion
workflow.humanDoes: Handles escalations, makes priority decisions, manages exceptions
workflow.reasoning: AI excels at this type of work. Human relationships matter here.

desuck.learning: Track error rates weekly. Feed human corrections back to improve AI recommendations. Review collaboration modes monthly and adjust based on what's working.

transition.humanElement: Start with the team that feels the pain most. Get operations aligned before expanding.
transition.pilotPlan: Run a 2-week pilot with the morning shift. Measure before and after, then scale based on results.
